name: A Senator's Sacrifice
description: A Senator's Sacrifice is platform puzzle game where you must attempt to escape Pompeii at any cost necessary.  Not all of your fellow senators will be able to escape, sacrifices will have to be made.  Find your way amongst the ruined temple and look for the light as you jump your way through 12 levels. The stability of the structure is in critical condition. Choose your movement carefully as  bounce may be your last.
